questions.question: Thickening time is 4 hours but job estimate is 3.5 hours - what's your contingency for delays?
ECD during cement is 16.8 ppg, fracture gradient is 17.0 ppg - 0.2 ppg margin seems tight. What's your response to losses?

questions.expectedResponse: Lab test results at well conditions

questions.question: Your cement excess is 30% but caliper shows washouts - should you increase volume?
If float doesn't hold, how long before cement enters casing? What's your WOC procedure?
questions.expectedResponse: Float failure response and WOC protocol

questions.question: CBL is planned but acceptance criteria shows 80% bond - what's your remedial plan if it fails?
Spacer is 50 bbls but annular volume is 200 bbls - is this sufficient contact time for mud removal?
Pump rate is 8 bpm but cement unit has two pumps rated 5 bpm each - what's your redundancy if one fails?
Gas migration additive is specified but not on material inventory - has this been ordered?
Plug bump pressure is 2,500 psi but casing test pressure is 3,000 psi - how do you differentiate between good bump and failed test?
Slurry density is 16.0 ppg but free water is 2% - what's the density of the cement column after settling?
WOC is 12 hours but compressive strength test shows 500 psi at 12 hours - is this sufficient for pressure testing?
